member.name: T:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas
member.summary: Implementation of the ICanvas interface that provides drawing functionality. This class manages a bitmap canvas and handles basic drawing operations.

member.name: P:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Xpos
member.summary: Gets the current X coordinate of the drawing pen.

member.name: P:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Ypos
member.summary: Gets the current Y coordinate of the drawing pen.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AppCanvas class with the specified dimensions.
member.param: The width of the canvas in pixels.
The height of the canvas in pixels.
member.exception: Thrown when width or height are less than or equal to zero.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the drawing pen to the specified coordinates without drawing.
member.param: The X coordinate to move to.
The Y coordinate to move to.
member.exception: Thrown when coordinates are out of canvas bounds.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.DrawTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a line from the current pen position to the specified coordinates.
member.exception: Thrown when coordinates are out of canvas bounds.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.DrawCircle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a circle with the specified radius at the current pen position.
member.param: The radius of the circle to draw.
member.exception: Thrown when radius is invalid or circle exceeds canvas bounds.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.DrawRectangle(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a rectangle with the specified dimensions at the current pen position.
member.exception: Thrown when dimensions are invalid or rectangle exceeds canvas bounds.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.SetPenColor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the color of the drawing pen.
member.exception: Thrown when color values are outside the valid range (0-255).

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.WriteText(System.String)
member.summary: Writes text at the current pen position.
member.exception: Thrown when text position is out of canvas bounds.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Clear
member.summary: Clears the canvas and resets the pen position to the origin (0,0).

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.GetBitmap
member.summary: Gets a bitmap representation of the current canvas state.
member.returns: A Bitmap object containing the drawn image.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Circle(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a circle (alias for DrawCircle, used in unit tests).
member.param: Whether to fill the circle (not implemented in basic version).

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Rect(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a rectangle (alias for DrawRectangle, used in unit tests).
member.param: Whether to fill the rectangle (not implemented in basic version).

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.SetColour(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the pen color (alias for SetPenColor, used in unit tests).

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Reset
member.summary: Resets the pen position to the origin (0,0) without clearing the canvas.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.getBitmap
member.summary: Gets a bitmap representation of the current canvas state (alias for GetBitmap).
member.returns: A Bitmap object containing the drawn image.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the AppCanvas.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.AppCircle
member.summary: Command class for drawing circles on a canvas. Implements the ICommand interface to encapsulate circle drawing operations.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCircle.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AppCircle class with the specified radius.
member.param: The radius of the circle to draw.
member.exception: Thrown when radius is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCircle.Execute(BOOSEapp.ICanvas)
member.summary: Executes the circle drawing command on the specified canvas.
member.param: The canvas to draw the circle on.
member.exception: Thrown when the circle cannot be drawn (e.g., invalid radius or out of bounds).

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCircle.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the circle command.
member.returns: A string containing the radius of the circle.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.AppCommandFactory
member.summary: Factory class responsible for creating command objects based on a given input command line string. Supports commands such as moveto, drawto, circle, rectangle, pen color changes, reset, clear, and write text.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCommandFactory.CreateCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance based on the parsed command string.
member.param: The raw user input command containing the command keyword and its parameters.
member.returns: A concrete object matching the command string, or null if the command is invalid or cannot be parsed.
member.exception: Thrown when an unexpected error occurs during command parsing or object creation.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.AppDrawTo
member.summary: Command class for drawing a line to a specified position.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppDrawTo.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AppDrawTo class.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppDrawTo.Execute(BOOSEapp.ICanvas)
member.summary: Executes the draw-to command on the specified canvas.
member.param: The canvas to execute the command on.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppDrawTo.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the draw-to command.
member.returns: A string containing the destination coordinates.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.AppMoveTo
member.summary: Command class for moving the drawing pen to a specified position.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppMoveTo.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AppMoveTo class.
member.param: The X coordinate to move to.
The Y coordinate to move to.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppMoveTo.Execute(BOOSEapp.ICanvas)
member.summary: Executes the move command on the specified canvas.
member.param: The canvas to execute the command on.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppMoveTo.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the move command.
member.returns: A string containing the destination coordinates.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.AppParser
member.summary: Parses lines of text into a list of executable objects using the provided .

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppParser.#ctor(BOOSEapp.AppCommandFactory)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The responsible for creating command objects.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppParser.ParseCommands(System.String[])
member.summary: Parses an array of command lines into a list of objects. Ignores blank lines and lines beginning with '*'.
member.param: An array of raw command strings to be parsed.
member.returns: A list of successfully parsed instances.
member.exception: Thrown when an error occurs while parsing an individual command line.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.CanvasException
member.summary: Exception thrown when an error occurs during canvas operations.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CanvasException class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CanvasException class with a specified error message.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CanvasException class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.ICanvas
member.summary: Defines the basic drawing operations supported by a canvas, including movement, drawing shapes, setting pen color, writing text, and retrieving the rendered bitmap.

member.name: P:BOOSEapp.ICanvas.Xpos
member.summary: Gets the current X-coordinate of the drawing cursor.

member.name: P:BOOSEapp.ICanvas.Ypos
member.summary: Gets the current Y-coordinate of the drawing cursor.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.ICanvas.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the drawing cursor to a specified coordinate without drawing.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.ICanvas.DrawTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a line from the current cursor position to the specified coordinate.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.ICanvas.DrawCircle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a circle with the specified radius at the current cursor position.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.ICanvas.DrawRectangle(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a rectangle with the specified width and height starting at the current cursor position.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.ICanvas.SetPenColor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the pen color used for subsequent drawing operations.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.ICanvas.WriteText(System.String)
member.summary: Writes text at the current cursor position.
member.param: The text to be drawn on the canvas.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.ICanvas.Clear
member.summary: Clears the canvas and resets its content.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.ICanvas.GetBitmap
member.summary: Retrieves the current bitmap representation of the canvas.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.ICommand
member.summary: Interface for command objects in the drawing program. Follows the Command pattern to encapsulate drawing operations.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.ICommand.Execute(BOOSEapp.ICanvas)
member.summary: Executes the command on the specified canvas.
member.param: The canvas to execute the command on.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.MainForm
member.summary: Main form for the BOOSE Drawing Application. Provides a graphical user interface for entering drawing commands, executing them, and viewing the results on a canvas.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.MainForm.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MainForm class. Sets up the canvas, picture box, and displays library information.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.MainForm.InitializeCanvas
member.summary: Initializes the drawing canvas with the specified dimensions and sets up the picture box for displaying the canvas.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.MainForm.DisplayAboutInfo
member.summary: Displays information about the BOOSE library in the output text box and writes it to the debug window.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.MainForm.RefreshCanvas
member.summary: Refreshes the canvas display by updating the picture box with the current canvas bitmap.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.MainForm.ExecuteButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler for the Execute button click. Executes the drawing program entered in the program text box and displays the results or any errors encountered.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.MainForm.ExecuteProgram(System.String)
member.summary: Executes a drawing program by parsing and processing each line.
member.param: The text of the drawing program to execute.
member.exception: Thrown when a command cannot be executed.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.MainForm.ProcessCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Processes a single drawing command by parsing it and executing the corresponding canvas operation.
member.exception: Thrown when the command is invalid or cannot be parsed.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.MainForm.ClearCanvasButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler for the Clear Canvas button click. Clears the canvas and refreshes the display.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.MainForm.ClearOutputButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler for the Clear Output button click. Clears the output text box and redisplays the about information.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.MainForm.MainForm_FormClosing(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used. This method is called when the form is closing.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.MainForm.CleanupResources
member.summary: Cleans up managed resources used by the form. Disposes of the canvas and picture box image to prevent memory leaks.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.Program
member.summary: The main entry point for the BOOSE Drawing Application.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.Program.Main
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.ResetCommand
member.summary: Represents a command that resets the canvas state.

member.summary: Executes the reset operation on the canvas. If the canvas is an AppCanvas, its state is reset.
member.param: The canvas on which the reset action is performed.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.SetPenColorCommand
member.summary: Command class for setting the pen color.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SetPenColorCommand class.
member.exception: Thrown when any color component is outside the range 0-255.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.SetPenColorCommand.Execute(BOOSEapp.ICanvas)

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.WriteTextCommand
member.summary: Represents a command that writes text onto the canvas.
